extendedInfo.description: Deccan Chronicle Holdings Limited (DCHL) is the publisher of largest circulated English Newspaper in South India â âDeccan Chronicleâ with a circulation of over 1.45 Million Copies per day across Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Karnataka and Kerala with Eleven editions from Hyderabad, Vijayawada, Rajahmundry, Vishakapatnam, Anantapur, Karimnagar, Nellore, Chennai, Coimbatore, Bengaluru and Kochi.DCHL also publishes âAsian Ageâ, an English daily newspaper in Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, and London; Financial English Daily âFinancial Chronicleâ out of the Metro Cities of Delhi, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Bangalore and Chennai; Telugu Daily, weekly, monthly âAndhra Bhoomiâ in Andhra Pradesh.Deccan Chronicleâs Android App provides you an opportunity to avail the newspaperâs complete insight and also continuously updated articles throughout the world. This app brings the news paper and its content one step closer to the users enabling them to personalize and share their favorite news articles and read it from anywhere for free.FEATURESâ¢	All content available for free.â¢	Top News: Latest news as and when they occur from all over the world.â¢	India: Updated Stories from all over India.â¢	Cities: News from various cities in Andhra Pradesh, Tamilnadu, Karnataka and Kerala.â¢	Entertainment: Latest movie reviews and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood, Tollywood, Kollywood and more.â¢	Tabloid: Tabloid stories from Hyderabad, Chennai, Bengaluru and Kochi.â¢	Science and Technology: Latest updates on gadgets, gaming, space and more.â¢	Lifestyle: Stories from fashion, health, corporate, stress, pets, books, latest trends, cars and bikes and many more.â¢	Photo Galleries: Top images of people and events from around the world.â¢	Columns: Opinion from some of the biggest names in the business of Sports, Arts, Entertainment, Business and Lifestyle. â¢	Sunday Chronicle: Sundayâs special supplement from print edition.â¢	Share: Users can share their favorite stories and pictures through mail or twitter.â¢	Comment: Users can post comments for any and every story.â¢	Breaking news: Get Breaking news and other alerts from Deccan Chronicle via push notification.â¢	Simple and easy navigation.Added Tabloid, ShowBiz, Sunday Chronicle, Lifestyle and Sci-Tech in the More section.Implemented Article Comments, Facebook, Share, Twitter, Feedback and Help.

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: I am happy to see DC but it crashes very soon and it has problem with it notifications, they should improve on that part. I mean after clicking notification I mean the flash news, it should open that page rather than the app as whole and searching for that particular news. Please take this into consideration

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Having an app just for the heck of it isn\'t cool. Does not open most of the times and force closes itself. Redundant UI. Improper settings, whatever view it offers blocks content by ads. No weather updates. In cricket section half of the news are of India Australia series of January and February updated today at current time. No push notifications although description of the app says so in what\'s new part. Being a DC reader this is awful. Even the 1 star is????No wonder DC is going down drain.
reviews.author: PRASHANTH KUMAR SILAMKOTI

reviews.title: Good coverage. Easy access.
reviews.comment: DC stands apart in news, reviews, analysis and relevance. The application is reasonably fast, however suffers from very small interactive buttons. Difficult to tap on smaller or compact devices like xperia ray. A major problem is with annoying ads blocking content. That\'s a blunder or well thought (sarcasm intended) but incorrect marketing.  Editorial Content is absolutely thought provoking.
reviews.author: tom cruise
